name: Just Basketball v1.0
description:
Just Basketball is a game where you shoot basketballs into hoops

This is the first project this team has ever created in Unity. Version 1.0 hopes to create a playable product that we can build off of using community feedback. We have plans to add multiplayer, different point additions, dribbling and all sorts of future mechanics that we can implement.

Controls:
wasd = Movement

e = pick up ball

Left click = Short shot

Right click = Long Shot

We would love to see what kind of shots you can make, be sure to comment your feedback and tell us what you would like to see next!
